name: OLX Global BV
goal: We are the worldâ€™s fastest-growing online classifieds network; we make it easier for people to trade with each other, fostering economic growth in local communities.
interests: Competition, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: We follow these policies: Digital Single Market, Competition, Taxation, Data Protection, Trade. In particular, the DSM includes a number of initiatives that are of interest, including on platform-to-business relations, and a range of actions undertaken by EU institutions on illegal content online. In this context, we plan to meet with Commission officials, and Members and officials of the European Parliament to explain what we do (for example to keep illegal content off our platforms) and what we believe the best policy approach is for the EU.
